english.segment1: How's your head? I'm so sorry. That I can't do anything about it. Like I said, I'll be praying. Here without you I feel helpless
english.segment2: Sorry I had to go away. Tomorrow's just another day. without you here, I'll have to say. Hold on to love
english.segment3: How's your day? Do you miss me?. Right now I've only a minute. Called to say, I'm so sorry. And once again I feel helpless
english.segment4: God forbid we'd be apart. How close or shall I ask how far. are we until the demise of this helplessness.
